dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 128 IH: Fentanyl is a WMD Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Boebert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To require the Assistant Secretary for the Countering Weapons of Mass Destruction Office of the Department of Homeland Security to treat illicit fentanyl as a weapon of mass destruction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fentanyl is a WMD Act.

section.header: Treatment of illicit fentanyl as a weapon of mass destruction
section.text: The Assistant Secretary for the Countering Weapons of Mass Destruction Office of the Department of Homeland Security shall treat illicit fentanyl as a weapon of mass destruction for purposes of title XIX of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 590 et seq.).
